text: Barra El Mezquital is a barrier island on the coast of the Mexican state of Tamaulipas, separating the Laguna Madre from the Gulf of Mexico. It lies approximately east of San Fernando, Tamaulipas, and south of Brownsville, Texas, U.S. It is frequently used as a reference point ("breakpoint") in government-issued weather advisories. ==References== Category:Islands of Mexico Category:Barrier islands
title: Barra El Mezquital
